To generate text tailored to your data, Google Workspace with Gemini uses relevant information from your sheet. Enter this into cell Or, at the top of the spreadsheet, click Insert and then Function and then AI. Examples: 
=AI(“Generate slogan for event in 10 words or less”, A2)
=AI("Create an email to the reviewer addressing specific items in their reviews.", A2:G2)
=AI("develop a list of keywords for the job title based on the summary of duties.", A2:C2)

To help you understand your data, Google Workspace with Gemini analyzes the content of your spreadsheet and extracts important key takeaways.  Enter this into cell Or, at the top of the spreadsheet, click Insert and then Function and then AI. Examples:  
=AI("For the customer, write a one sentence summary of their feedback.", A2:D2)
=AI("you are a customer service representative. Write a 2 sentence summary for the customer about their product or service inquiry.", F2)
=AI("List in bullet points the main themes of the customer concern.", D2)

To help you detect patterns, Google Workspace with Gemini categorizes your data into groups. This includes sentiment analysis. Enter this into cell Or, at the top of the spreadsheet, click Insert and then Function and then AI. Examples: 
=AI("Classify the preview as either a spam email or not a spam email.", D2)
=AI("Categorize the customer inquiry as a compliment, exchange request, or return request.",C2)
=AI("Classify the order by which product description is in the order. Use the product description to help.", A2:C2)
